attributes.action: Immediate Windfall tax on the huge profits of gas and electric corporations
attributes.background: Adults and children will be pushed further  into poverty. homelessness and  starvation.  There will likely be increased crime and this is unacceptable. Take more from the greedy corporations who are making such ludicrous profits off the misery of others in order to reduce peoples utility bills.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Tax 50% of the Energy Companies profits to help households pay bills: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607983

Fund payments to energy customers to cover price rises by taxing oil companies: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/608136
